column1: Smoque BBQ////Awesome place to eat! I had the pulled pork
column2: fries and baked beans. Pulled pork was definitely the best I've had
column3: fries was plentiful and fresh! Baked beans was a little to sweet for me but still good! Parking is hard around the restaurant
column4: but if you park near the bridge
column5: its free and plenty of parking!
